EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email to notify the Owner of Application that the application has been reviewed by the Reviewer
EmailTemplate.name: Grantee Notify Application Owner that Review is provided
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Application # {!Application__c.Name} has been Reviewed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification of Application reviewed # {!Application__c.Name}
This is to notify that the Appplication {!Application__c.Name} with {!Application__c.Title__c} has been reviewed . Please login to GovGrants to view the status of your Application. or click here {!Application__c.Link}.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
